attributes.action: Call for a Welsh independence referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Wales is forgotten be Westminster and it’s about time this changes.
Over 2 billion pounds of water is taken out of Wales for free and we receive nothing for it. We’re also paying tax to Westminster for no benefit of our own
attributes.background: Allow Wales to hold a referendum in 2025.  and become its own country. I would like the People of Wales to be able to hold a peaceful referendum next year

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701455
